spec_data.Name: perl-Hash-Util-FieldHash-Compat
spec_data.Description:
Under older perls this module provides a drop in compatible API to
Hash::Util::FieldHash using perltie. When Hash::Util::FieldHash is
available, it will use that instead.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:16:51 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Use Hash::Util::FieldHash or ties, depending on availability
